name: Oni Crash
description:
Oni Crash is an old-school style casual game. The monsters in game are based on Japanese ghost and re-designed into all kinds of cute characters.

The player plays a role as a monster smashing Red Devil. Those monsters will show up in different shapes when reaching higher levels and you need to avoid bumping into their arms.

The rule is simple but it’s not easy to hit high score! You can compete with players from all over the world through in-game World Rank.

So, what are you waiting for? Come and take the challenge today and smash as many monsters as you can!
